website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for small, soft toys for a little dog who is a mild chewer, this 5-pack makes a nice gift. Otherwise, check out competing sets with more durable toys.
pros: Adorable plush food-themed toys in shapes and sizes for small pooches
Suitable for playing fetch with pint-sized canines
Brightly colored banana, strawberry, mushroom, eggplant, and carrot
cons: Not made for medium or large dogs or aggressive chewers, as they are small and could easily be destroyed and swallowed
Care must be taken if toys are torn due to the small squeakers that could easily be swallowed

customer_reviews.title: Cute !!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves them and can easily carry them around the house, my big dog ripped it to sheds in minutes. Super cute toys! Good present for anyone who has a small pup! Put a fork in the pic so you can see the size, some aren't pictured because they were eaten 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M

customer_reviews.title: One of the best chihuahua toys on earth
customer_reviews.text: One of the best chihuahua toys on earth. My chi's are on their 5th package of them. They only tear into them for squeaker removal service if there is a silent war going on between the 2 of them. Life is not possible without these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Spunkymoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teething puppy!
customer_reviews.text: These are such cute stuffed toys! Perfect for my 2 month old pup. These definitely would NOT hold up with medium/large dogs. Holding off on giving her the eggplant til she's of age ;)
customer_reviews.author: KColeman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 month old lab mix. She just got spayed so she isn't too active at the moment. She loves them! Can't seem to decide which one she wants to play with and ends up switching between all of them. I like that they all have squeakers and there's crinkle paper in the peel of the banana and on the stems of the eggplant and strawberry. My pup's pretty gentle on toys for the most part; she just likes to squish them and squeak them. These would probably not last long with a heavy chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Too delicate and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These toys are really really bad and too weak/delicate. My puppy managed to chew off the green piece from eggplant within minutes, and ate it too :( The top part of the toys is not glued very strongly. They should be stitched with high quality instead. I would go with the better quality branded toys that are made to last for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MMD

customer_reviews.title: Good. Could be better
customer_reviews.text: My large Rottie loves small toys. I can't tell you why but she prefers the small over the large. it's kind of funny. These are for Christmas... I broke down and have her the little mushroom. She loves it. The squeaks on some are weak though. Like they didn't work on every squeeze. But you get what you pay for. Product is true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update August 31st - Customer service contacted me about my concerns with the quality of these toys. I am impressed by the care that this company puts into ensuring their clients are happy and that the puppies enjoying their toys are safe! Thank you UEETEK! These toys are cute and I think small dogs will be entertained by the soft squeak and the crunch of the banana. The seam on the eggplant, however, was torn, and stuffing was popping out of the side. Mind you, we have not even given these to our pet yet. I am very concerned about the quality of these toys. I would not recommend them for an animal that has any level of strength.
customer_reviews.author: comp5330

customer_reviews.title: Nary A Squeak to Be Heard
customer_reviews.text: These toys are indeed the right size for small dogs, but if your aim, as mine was, is to buy squeaky toys, forget these! They have the small squeaker mechanisms in them, but these do not work at all. Evidently there is no quality control or squeaker tester. You'd think. one of the five toys might, by the law of averages, work. Nope! -- Dictated by a disgruntled Shih Tsu
customer_reviews.author: Kauluwai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size toys for chihuahuas!
customer_reviews.text: I have two 5lb chihuahuas and these little toys are all the rage with them. They're the perfect size and weight for their little mouths. Some of them crinkle and some squeak, which they love. It's also nice to get a bunch in one order because then you can rotate their toys out and make it more fun for them. Will def buy more!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Cute little soft squeaky toys for our dogs & cats.
customer_reviews.text: These are all soft and lightweight and nicely made. Not excessively sturdy but our dogs like to carry them around and make them squeak. The cats play with them to, a swat across the floor, or pick one up to cuddle during a nap. My mini Schnauzer can be a very determined, quickly destructive chewer but doesn’t want to tear these open. The little chihuahua just loves to carry them around and takes one to bed sometimes. A toy and a blankie is his thing. It’s a very cute little set. After a few weeks they are all in perfect shape. I’m glad I got this and the price was nice and low.
customer_reviews.author: FuchsiaLady

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure these would survive my 10 wk of Boston - but they've held up for solo chewing and tug-of-war with the older dog. The crunchy texture holds her interest, but she doesn't get a lot of squeak out of them (a bonus, in my opinion) Nice price for a good variety
customer_reviews.author: shoppinghawk

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, so I was aware that the squeekers might not be great. Most work for now, one didn't right out of the package, but really they are so cute (and inexpensive) it doesn't matter! My new pug puppy loves them, and loves having a different one every day! Both the banana and the eggplant have little crinkly stuff in them, which stimulates him. Why doesn't the strawberry have a face...? I kind of wish it did, but I don't think the dog really cares!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: HARDLY SQUEAKS AT ALL.
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute. Well sewn. But the squeakers are tiny and poorly made. I can hardly squeak them when I feel around the toy and the dog can’t squeak them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Diokas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these squeaky toys! She's a toy size chihuahua. She especially loves the carrot & banana, not sure why. Inexpensive and she's had them for a week and they're still intact. Also they're pretty cute. Update: Second purchase, my dog loves these toys! She played with the last ones until they looked sad looking, which was a full year. These are her favorite, especially the banana.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 16 week old Coton puppy. These are perfect for little mouths. The strawberry is her favorite. I just have to make sure my two ACDs do not get ahold of them. When needed, I will buy again. Update: the little dogs in my house love these little toys so much, I ordered more when the two big dogs have accidentally gotten ahold of them. These toys are perfect for little dogs only. When needed, I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Defect??
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller has reached out in regards to my order & offered a refund since I accidentally received 2 non squeaky toys. My pup still promo customer service. ORIGINAL: Cute and great size. 2 out of my 5 toys don’t squeak however. Great for my sanity but sad day for my pup. She’s obsessed with the squeaky toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for New Puppies or Small Dogs
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our new beagle puppy and he LOVED THEM! The crinkle was a great way to get his attention, and the ones with the squeakers kept him occupied for hours. Sadly, our bigger dog realized how fun they were and shredded them, but it was only because he loved them as much as the puppy! I’d recommend only for little dogs, as stated in the product title, but it was a great value for the number of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Crinkly, Squeaky, and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, they have crinkly parts and squeaky parts. If your dog is a super aggressive chewer and tears through kong products these aren't going to be a good fit. But for my small average chewer dogs they're the perfect size and they'll last long enough before the stuffing starts getting pulled out for this price point :)
customer_reviews.author: Camaro Cass

customer_reviews.title: My Tiny Puppy Made a Hole in the Toy
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but my tiny eight week old Yorkie puppy was able to chew a hole in the mushroom in just a small amount of time. I would imagine a bigger or older dog would tear these up even quicker. I haven't given her the other toys yet---I'm curious to see how well they hold up. I am editing this to add that the seller did contact me and gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: IowaBrenda

customer_reviews.title: I love to spoil my dogs with tons of toys on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to spoil my dogs with tons of toys on Christmas, so I loved that this came in a pack of 5. Two months later, they're still carrying them around. They particularly love the strawberry, which is ironic because they do not like actual strawberries. Some of the squeakers are a bit hard to squeak, but the dogs still like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rip apart
customer_reviews.text: It took my chihuahua (who doesn't have all of his teeth) about 10 minutes to rip the squeakers out of these. He liked them for those ten minutes though... Update: he really, really loves these toys even torn apart so I can't really be all that mad
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gwirtz

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how long these dog toys will last with my viscous, yet cute 11 month old puppy, but she sure does love them. They're cute and a decent size. She loves playing and sleeping with them. The quality seems good as well.
customer_reviews.author: RemyJax

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute, But Squeaking Ball Too Small
customer_reviews.text: All of the toys are really cute and my puppy really loves them. However, the little ball that must be pressed down to squeak is so small that the toy doesn't squeak when biting it himself. It is pretty hard even for myself to find the little thing inside the toy that makes it squeak. Great nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: My dog just loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have an 9lb dog. Most dog toys don't interest her as she can't manipulate them. She LOVES these. She can get a good grip on them with her tiny mouth, and the squeeker inside fascinates her. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Winter

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVED these toys
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a 5 if they were indestructible... but my puppy was able to pull them apart after a while. However, they are the perfect size for a toy breed. I have a 4 pound Yorkie. Of all the toys I've offered, these were by far her favorite. I will be buying another pack of them for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have been fun for him (he's 9 pounds)
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves all of these toys. They are already very worn after 5 weeks, so we might be buying more. These have been fun for him (he's 9 pounds), but I wouldn't recommend buying these if you're expecting a super durable toy. Definitely not for strong chewers!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: These toys don't squeak = worthless
customer_reviews.text: The whole point to these toys is that they're supposed to squeak when a dog bites down or chews on them. These squeak not at all and my dogs are frustrated. The seller asks to be contacted if there is a problem - but then does not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: He Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My small breed absolutely loves these toys! They're easy for him to pick up thanks to the size. His favorite is the mushroom and eggplant! They've held up well, no tears or stuffing have been noticed. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Shih Tzus and these toys they just love them. There is a good variety and the size is good for their smaller mouths. They go crazy running back and forth and I think one of them has picked her favorite (a banana). The toys are all very cute and I think pretty durable, though our girls don't really chew at toys to try and break them.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Habert

customer_reviews.title: Cute & great value! but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 04/30 These toys aren’t very durable. I’ve had them for less than a month and she’s torn up half of them because the stems arent connected very well and when its torn open there, the stuffing is exposed. She’s been eating the stuffing :( She loves them!! The toys will get slobbery, but its okay because that is what happens with plushies. They arent the squishiest, which is preferable for my doggie cus she’s got some chompers!! The leaves/peels parts of the toys are also that crinkly material so you’re getting crinkles and squeakies in one!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long with chewers
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to tear apart her soft toys and get the squeaker and stuffing out. Makes no difference the brand. Two minutes and the toy is a goner. Even after they are "dead" she plays with them. The stuffed toys are cute, soft and she does love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. The size is perfect for her (18 lb bichon frise). She is interested in stuffed toys in general, but with the squeakers and the crinkly peel on the banana, they are extra fun. Of course, we humans appreciate the design too.
customer_reviews.author: llc77

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs (miniature pinchers) love these toys I have bought other small toys and they don’t play with them . They don’t hold up very long to their tiny razor like teeth but they enjoy them so much . I’m buying new ones every 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: While I like what I received - I only received 3 out of the 5 items (missing mushroom and eggplant). I've contacted Amazon customer service since I can't seem to contact the seller directly. I'll bump up my star review if I can actually get the rest of the items I paid for. Soft and cute but not worth it if you can't even get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These toys are very cute. The size is nice for smaller dogs. The way they are made I wouldn’t say is fantastic. The squeaky sound on them is weak and probably a low quality. Overall I doubt I would order this item again. The features that are nice are crinkle paper which is on the eggplant, banana and strawberry. However there’s glue on certain toys. Why glue?!? Cheap manufacturing !! Definitely seems unsafe and wouldn’t give them to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nowii

customer_reviews.title: Little Dogs Delight
customer_reviews.text: Little Dogs Delight indeed! I bought these toys for my small dogs for Christmas and they love them. My dogs are not seek and destroy types though. Very good quality...no odor at all and larger than expected, super cute too. Some have squeakers and some rustle like paper inside. No tags to cut off. I would recommend them if your dog doesn’t just destroy stuffed toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sally D

customer_reviews.title: Great little toys!
customer_reviews.text: My little doxie loves these! Good for a dog that can't hold big toys. They squeak but aren't obnoxious. They wash well too, I don't dry them in the dryer but they hold up well. My dog likes to leave them outside to get dirty so I have washed a few times already since Christmas. I will buy again once these are done.
customer_reviews.author: April Grissinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My old chihuahua who's missing several teeth was overjoyed with these toys. They're just the right size for him to carry around and squeak when the mood strikes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and adorable toys
customer_reviews.text: My little shih tzu loved these little squeaky toys for Christmas! Takes them everywhere he goes. Very cute and adorable toys. very safe for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Tiny toys for tiny dogs  a definite buy
customer_reviews.text: tiny squeaky toys bought for a dachshund. he loved them and he looked very cute with toys his size he could decide which one he liked best so from Franklin this was a rave review
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these toys for my 2 small dogs to play with. They were the perfect size for my two chihuahua mixes though and they were really cute. They didn't last very long because my dogs always chew on them until they can get the stuffing coming out.
customer_reviews.author: CATTOWN

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These are very small toys and are perfect for small dogs! We loved them. They are squeaky and the toys have some different textures, keeping it fun for the pups. I don’t expect these toys to last forever but they are definitely a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and quality for a miniature dog
customer_reviews.text: So cute for a tiny dog. I’ve been searching for tiny stuffed toys for my 7 pound chihuahua and these are perfect size for him and pretty great quality for the price! Since he’s a rescue he’s a little nervous about these right now but I’m sure he will take to them soon enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jopek

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft but not so sqeaked
customer_reviews.text: There's a really cute but only two of them actually make noise. The squeaky sound several of them do not make any sounds. They're very soft and I bought this for a 9 pound dog.
customer_reviews.author: Vtuc

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much we bought them twice!
customer_reviews.text: Have had 2 small dogs love these now. Bought them a second time for our new pup and he has been in toy heaven. I just wish the squeakers were more durable. These lasted a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy pack for our new 8 week old Boston Terrier puppy. The toys are so adorable and exactly as pictured. Their so soft and have wrinkle paper and squeakers. She absolutly loves each and everyone of them. They are a good size for and she can grow into them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: Our two chippets (chihuahua whippets) LOVE these. Some squeak and some squeak and are crinkly and the range of sizes is awesome. The banana and eggplant seem to be their favorite but they play with all of them. The squeak isn't very loud which is good because they got a very squeaky toy as a gift and it scares them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Orwell

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutey loves these. She has learned some of them by name. They are great for training and overall just fun! I love the variety that is recieved. They are adorable. We have had them for about three to four months and all of the squeekers are still squeeking.
customer_reviews.author: College Kid

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toys for a Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I have not found a better toy for my Chihuahua except for some mouse cat toys that have cat nip and squeak when you touch them. These definitely get number two of like 100. Will definitely buy again but a larger set. They crinkle like plastic which she loves. She can't get them to squeak but when I squeez them it really gets her instant attention. VERY good size for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Sam

customer_reviews.title: Puppy approved!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My two dogs love them, and carry them all over the house. They have both squeaker and crinkle stuff inside. Just the right size for a Frenchie and Shih-Tzu!
customer_reviews.author: M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for squeak, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these compared to the little hedgehogs purchased several times. I thought I’d give our dogs something different but what a mistake! The squeaker only works in one!
customer_reviews.author: smkd18

customer_reviews.title: Mostly durable, even for a destructive mini hotdog
customer_reviews.text: My mini hotdog sure did enjoy these little toys. Even though she is a destructive little thing, she was unsuccessful in ripping a part the mushroom and the carrot (they are going on over a year now)!
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: The banana is her favorite. Our dog weighs 15 lbs and usually destroys her toys within a couple of months she has had these for a year nibbles on them all the time and they are still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: sandyink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually holding up very well. After about a month of having them there are at least 3 of the 5 still hanging around. Of course the dogs broke the squeakers in a day or 2 but that happens with anything. I have 6 small dogs and they instantly grabbed one and played with it all day.
customer_reviews.author: swanlakemt

customer_reviews.title: Well made toys, great deal
customer_reviews.text: I thought the were the dumbest looking toys, but they were cheap and guess what, our dog loves them! These are some of the few squeaky toys she hasn't destroyed. We've had them for almost year, and there are no rips or holes and the squeakers in all but the banana still work. (She still likes the banana because the peel is crinkly). These toys seem to be very well made and are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Summer T.

customer_reviews.title: these don't squeak
customer_reviews.text: These do not squeak. Rather, they have a little plastic bulb inside, but it makes no noise when chewed. The product, I think, is simply very cheaply made. The dogs ripped them apart in seconds. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Adams

customer_reviews.title: They did not squeak as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed because my dogs like to make them squeak. I tried and not one of them wouid squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Greekladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These toys exceeded my expectations. Whatever substances they put in these toys really atracks dogs of all breeds. Both of my dogs love these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs. (Pomeranians)
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find the right toys for small dogs. My fifteen year old Poms love these. The squeakers are cheap and do not last long but they love the banana and the mushroom.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Tiny squeaker
customer_reviews.text: I usually get squeaky toys for Christmas, the build on these are fine and I haven't torn them apart yet, but the squeaker inside are really small an are difficult to actually get the squeaker to make a noise so I didn't fin these too fun, so I am only rating these a 3
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!! My 11lb mini poodle loves these small ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! My 11lb mini poodle loves these small toys and for the price it is a good set!! She loves the crinkle on the banana best!! These would not be good for a tough chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these and so does my pup (10lbs). We’ve had them for a while now and so far we’ve only lost Mr. Banana (may he Rest In Peace). I’ve had to patch up a corner or two after he goes crazy chewing on the ends of them. He does this with all of his toys and usually dissects them over time. Since I patched up the toys they’ve just drifted around the apartment and occasionally may be caught in the grip of my pooch’s teeths 😆 I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica D

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu puppy is 9 months old and loved these toys. He did manage to separate a seam and get some stuffing out on one of them but has been playing with them all weekend and they seem to be holding up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: joyce pettit

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Toys
customer_reviews.text: We had a litter of boxer pups and I wanted some soft and fun chew toys for them. These were the perfect size, and they loved the “crunch” a few of them had (especially the banana). Of course, they got soiled on, so I would just toss them in the wash/dryer with the other puppy laundry, and they came out clean as new! They are so cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: waste of money...there are better toys out there. Dog just looked at me like I was crazy, could have given her a old rolled up sock and she would've had more fun
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: My parents small dog loved them
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my parents small dog. She loves that some crinkle, and they have squeakers but not all of them work. They're actually small enough for her to carry comfortably, so they get carried all over the house. She's a chihuahua mix
customer_reviews.author: sagray09

customer_reviews.title: Miniature Dachshund's best friends
customer_reviews.text: My doxie puppy is about 8 pounds and absolutely loves these toys. He destroys bigger toys and rips the stuffing right out of them, but for some reason he hasn't shredded these. He will pick them up and sprint around the house with them in his mouth, but doesn't seem to be too interested in dismantling them. Can't beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I got these yesterday and put them in a small pile on the floor. My little dog loves them and soon started carrying them around the house and playing with them. She is a smaller dog (malshi). These are perfect for her. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good quality, great for small dogs to chew, squeak and toss. I have 4 dogs under 15 lbs and 2 love to play "look, I have the BEST toy" with each other with these.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Good for young pups
customer_reviews.text: I had a litter of 10 pups and these were cheap and ease to wash. They loved the squeaky part of em too.. When the pups get older, you just have to supervise when they play with them so they don't get the squeaker part out.. But I did buy 2 batches of these.. Pups loved em!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelzz

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Cute but 3 out of 5 toys don’t squeak. Seller said will replace so far I haven’t received any & this was purchased last month.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: My pups love them. Obviously not super durable squeaker but they still play with them even after some of the squeakers went out. Decent quality!
customer_reviews.author: D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend's little Maltese and he loves them! They're the perfect size for him to carry around and play with. The combination of squeaky and crinkly parts of the different toys are really fun for him too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looks nice but the squeaky sucked on just about all products with the exception of one. So 1 outta 5. My dog doesn’t care so I will rate 1 star but I would not buy it again nor recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Camarena

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but you have to squeeze to hard to hear the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: So many little squeaky toys for a great price! My dog is obsessed and I’m constantly finding fruit around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Green

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly these have lasted longer then most every other toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my goldendoodle when he was 4 months old. He's now 11 months old, and these are some of the few toys that have endured it all.....teething, growing jaw size..... I love these because he can just carry them around his mouth and it doesn't have anything to hold with his paw and rip with his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: The toys are very cute however half of the squeakers didn’t work. My poor puppy is trying to get them to Squeak with all of his might. I’m very disappointed in this product as half of the shipment was shipped with damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Loves Vintage

customer_reviews.title: ... too small - I was wrong - these are perfect for a smaller puppy
customer_reviews.text: I thought these might be too small - I was wrong - these are perfect for a smaller puppy! We have a pug puppy and he loves these. The banana has a squeaker and the peels are the crinkle toy material. He loves that one! These were definitely near the top of toys we got for him! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: The LMM

customer_reviews.title: He likes the color and the occasional squeak he gets but these aren't his favorite.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay toys but my terrier who is under 15 lbs is too big and rough for these. He likes the color and the occasional squeak he gets but these aren't his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Dog toys that don’t squeak
customer_reviews.text: My dog toys don’t have working squeakers The ad said to let them know and they will replace them. Am trying to get in touch with them.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toys for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 lb chiweenies! Finally happy to find toys that they can play with! They love to run around the house with these toys. You get multiple toys too which keeps them intersted!! The squeaker is kind of dull which is why I rated only four stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog toys
customer_reviews.text: These are small, perfect for a small dog. My Westie thinks they’re great. Got dirty quickly but weren’t chewed up
customer_reviews.author: Boston Garden Gal

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Arrived with tears at the seams with stuffing hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My little puppy loves these!!! She has had so much fun with them. When I got her she was 6 lbs, and now she’s 13 lbs. still loves them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Matz

customer_reviews.title: They didn't squeak!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs were not happy, only two of the toys squeak. I got these before and they all worked and lasted so long. I don't know what changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great squeaker
customer_reviews.text: Cute small toys but the squeaker is small and not in the middle so hard to get them to squeak.... if they weren’t so cheap I would return.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Kittens RescueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's hard to find small toys for our 3 little fur babies, that are also safe. These have exceeded our expectations! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: CruisingForLife

customer_reviews.title: Durable and puppy enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves to chew on these. Especially the crinkly parts. They are easy to chew on and keep him enterained. They are also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: they made a wonderful Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pup and it loves them. She is always carrying one around. Shockingly, she has yet to destroy one. They don't "squeak" very well. However, they made a wonderful Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: fast shpg and perfect size. very colorful and toss well
customer_reviews.text: fast shpg and perfect size. very colorful and toss well. sadly no squeak. 7# maltese likes them but would be soooo much better with a working squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy O

customer_reviews.title: Fav toy of my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these toys. Quality is good and showing expected wear from a little dog who is pretty exuberant. He likes the variety - squeaky and crinkly noises.
customer_reviews.author: SCG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculously adorable. The banana is my favorite. :) My pup loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Quiet
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived quickly. They are well made and very cute. The only negative for me ( or my dog I should say ) is that they don't squeak very loud. It is very quiet. And the squeaker seems to move around. So if your dog likes a loud squeaker, these may not be the toy for them.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price, cute toys, squeak and crinkle, they love the play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela P

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for my little Brussels Griffin, and these are very soft. However, they are sold as squeaky toys, and four out of the five no longer squeak after just one day, the one that does is barely audible. Poorly designed, but they do look great. Do not buy if your dog he loves the squeak.!
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them but the two smaller strawberry and mushroom are too small. They only have one small squeaker so it will not make noise often. Good price and it pretty good quality. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jake W

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little toys! My dogs love them, and this is the second or third time I’ve bought them! Obviously, they aren’t puppy proof though...either way, these are excellent for small dogs!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: I love these because not only do they squeak but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these because not only do they squeak but they have something in him that makes him kind of oily sounding and my dog absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little dogs
customer_reviews.text: My two chihuahuas love these toys, they are small enough that they can toss them up or knaw on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

product_meta.title: UEETEK Squeaky Dog Toys for Small Dogs Fruits and Vegetables Plush Puppy Dog Toys (A pack of 5)
product_meta.description:
Features

- Color: Shown in the pictures.
- Material: Plush.
- Size: Approx. 12-15cm/ 4.7 -6 inch.
- High quality for durable and safe use.
- Vibrant vegetable and fruit design with pleasant color and soft texture.


Package Including
5 * Squeaky Dog Toys for Small Dogs Fruits and Vegetables Plush Puppy Dog Toys (Carrot; Banana; Eggplant; Strawberry and Mushroom)
feature_bullets: Please Notice- If there is any one of these squeaky toys that is missing, broken or doesn't work, please contact us and we will provide replacement for you.
Pack of 5PCS- Carrot, Banana, Strawberry, Eggplant and Mushroom.This set of 5 squeaky plush dog toys is the best choice to help dogs expend excess energy and fight boredom.
Used for- Help dogs release anxiety and enhance feeling with family. Satisfy your dog's natural urge to chew and help its teeth and gums to grow healthily.
Soft Material- Made of non-toxic plush and cotton fabric material, safe for your pets to chew and play.
Suitable for Dogs- Approx. 12-15cm/ 4.7 -6 inch. Suitable for puppies, small dogs. Not suitable for those medium and large dogs with sharp teeth.
